account.error_phone_verif: Error with your validation code, please try again.
account.google_authenticator_intro: To use Google Authenticator as your account's double-authentication method, you first need to install the app on your iOS or Android device
account.google_authenticator_ready: Once you have the app ready to use, you can proceed
account.google_authenticator_scan_qr_code_explan: Scan the following QR Code using the "Scan a QR Code" in the Google Authenticator App
account.google_authenticator_scanned_qr_code: Once the QR code has been successfully scanned on your phone, you can proceed to the next step
account.google_authenticator_success_explanation: You have now successfully setup Google Authenticator with your account. Do not forget to save your changes to confirm!
account.google_authenticator_type_code: Please enter the 6 digit code from your Google Authenticator app below
account.google_authenticator_wrong_code: Invalid Code! Please try again, or wait for the next code to be generated in the Google Authenticator app
account.phone_required: To activate SMS verification, you need to enter a phone number
account.success_phone_verif: Phone number successfully verified! You can now save your profile
account.title: My Account
account.verify_phone_instructions: You should receive a code on your phone number in the next few seconds. Please enter it below to verify your phone number

batch.cannot_edit_macs: Because jobs have already been run on this batch, you cannot edit its MAC addresses
batch.change_warning: WARNING: you have updated either the model or manufacturer. We highly suggest updating your certificates to have them stay consistent with this batch by choosing the "Save and Update Certs" option
batch.create_certificates_explanation: Are you sure you want to create this batch's {{nbCerts}} certificates?
batch.delete_explanation: Are you sure you want to delete this batch? This will revoke all its {{nbCerts}} certificates and delete them. This operation is not revertible
batch.duplicate_in_file: Duplicate MAC found in row {{firstRow}} and {{secondRow}}: {{mac}}
batch.emails_to_notify: Emails to notify when this task is completed
batch.general_error_treating_file: General error while treating file: please make sure it is in .CSV format, contains only one column which has no header.
batch.mac_count_title: {{nb}} MACs are currently part of this batch
batch.need_devices: You need to have at least one certificate to create!
batch.phones_to_notify: Phone numbers to notify when the task is completed
batch.push_changes_explanation: Are you sure you want to push the batch information to all of this batche's certificates?
batch.revoke_explanation: Are you sure you want to revoke this batch? This will revoke all its {{nbCerts}} certificates. This operation is not revertible
batch.success_push: Successfully started push changes job! Job number: {{job}}
batch.title: Batch

certificates.common_names_explanation: Need a .CSV file of only one unnamed column containing 12 HEX digits device MACs.
certificates.error_revoke: Error while trying to revoke certificate: {{e}}
certificates.invalid_domain: Accepted formats are: domain.top_level_domain or sub_domain.domain._top_level_domain
certificates.revoke_warning: Are you sure you want to revoke this certificate?
certificates.title: Certificates

common.address_search_autofill: Search locations to auto-fill the fields below
common.creator: Creator
common.download_instructions: Download Successful! If you cannot find the file, please confirm that you are allowing downloads from this website
common.general_error: Error connecting to the server. Please consult your administrator.
common.name: Name
common.type_for_options: Type the value you need to create...

configurations.affected_explanation_one: There are {{count}} device affected by this configuration
configurations.affected_explanation_other: There are {{count}} devices affected by this configuration
configurations.cant_delete_explanation: Cannot delete this configuration because it is being used by at least one device, venue or entity. You can see what they are by clicking on the button next to "In Use" on this configuration's form
configurations.import_warning: WARNING: This operation will overwrite all the configuration sections you might have already created.
configurations.interfaces_instruction: Please use a valid JSON string in the following form: { "interfaces": [] }.
configurations.push_configuration_error: Error while trying to push configuration to device: {{e}}
configurations.title: Configurations

contacts.title: Title

crud.confirm_cancel: Are you sure you want to discard the changes you have made?
crud.confirm_delete_obj: Are you sure you want to delete this {{obj}}?
crud.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this {{obj}}?

entities.add_ips_explanation: You can add IPv4 or IPv6 addresses in the following formats
entities.cant_delete_explanation: Cannot delete this entity because it has child entities and/or venues. You need to delete all of this entity's children before deleting it
entities.claim_device_explanation: To claim devices you can use the table below. If a device was already claimed by another entity or venue we will also unassign them before assigning them to this entity
entities.enter_ips: Enter the IP(s) you'd like to add here
entities.error_sync: Error while trying to start synchronization of {{name}}: {{e}}
entities.failed_test: Failed tests with DigiCert credentials, please verify your entity information
entities.success_test: Test of this entity's DigiCert credentials was successful!
entities.sync_explanation: Would you like to synchronize this entity? This may take a while depending on the amount of certificates belonging to this entity.
entities.title: Entities

form.certificate_file_explanation: Please use a .pem file that starts with "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----" and ends with "-----END CERTIFICATE-----"
form.invalid_file_content: Invalid file content, please confirm that it is of the valid format
form.invalid_hostname: Invalid hostname: it needs to be composed of alphanumeric characters and dashes only
form.invalid_interfaces: Invalid Interfaces JSON string. Please confirm that your value is: valid JSON and has interfaces as its only key and that the interfaces value is an array. Example: {"interfaces": []}
form.invalid_password: Invalid password, please look at the password policy
form.key_file_explanation: Please use a .pem file that starts with "-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----" and ends with "-----END PRIVATE KEY-----"
form.min_max_string: Value needs to be of a length between {{min}} (inclusive) and {{max}} (inclusive)

inventory.invalid_serial_number: Invalid serial number. A serial number should only be 12 HEX chars (A-F, 0-9)
inventory.no_computed: No Computed Configuration: you will need to assign a valid configuration to see it
inventory.title: Inventory

locations.claim_explanation: To claim locations you can use the table below
locations.title: Locations

login.change_password_explanation: Enter and confirm your new password
login.email_instructions: You should soon receive a 6-digit code at your email address. If you cannot find it please verify your spam folder.
login.error_sending_code: Error while trying to send code: {{e}}
login.forgot_password_instructions: Enter your email address to receive an email containing the instructions to reset your password
login.forgot_password_successful: You should soon receive an email containing the instructions to reset your password. Please make sure to check your spam if you can't find the email
login.google_instructions: Please input the 6-digit code from your Google Authenticator app. If it is close to expiring, you can wait for a new one
login.invalid_credentials: Invalid Credentials, please confirm that you are using the right email and password.
login.login_explanation: Enter your email and password to sign in
login.sms_instructions: You should receive a 6-digit code on your phone soon. Please enter it below to login

map.delete_warning: Are you sure you want to delete this map? This operation is not reversible
map.title: Map

subscribers.claim_device_explanation: To claim devices you can use the table below. If a device was already claimed by a user, you will need to go to to their details and unassign it before claiming it.
subscribers.title: Subscribers
